name: Torchbearer
overview: Years ago, Talis Valutheart, a powerful and evil wizard, stole the Torch of Truth and hit it somewhere within the many sanctuaries and dungeons of Pastoria. With the people thus blinded, Vaultheart began to take the land. The time has ocme for a new hero to take it back! Will you accept the challenge? The Kingdom of Pastoria is a large island with many smaller islands surrounding. You will explore many of them on your quest for the lost Torch. Although you start as a common citizen, you are far from common. You possess the last of the mysterious luckstones! Study magic, increase your fighting strength and speak with the townspeople. All this will help you on your quest. Torchbearer is a challenging graphic adventure game.
